name: Ants vs Bugs
description:
Warning! This game has some serious Bugs!

GATHER A POWERFUL ARMY
Unite the scattered ant soldiers against the invading hordes of Large, Vicious Bugs attacking your nest. Numbers are your weapon, an Ant may be weak, but together Ants can overcome much more powerful enemies.

What do you call an Ant Army?
Militant

There’s more.

How many Ants are needed to fill an apartment?
Tenants

What do you call an ant who likes to be alone?
Independant

What do you call the ant who doesn’t go to school?
Truant

Features
• Unlock New Levels
• Fast action One touch Gameplay
• Real time physics
• Challenge your Friends for the High Score
• Extremely Fun and Addictive

How to Play:

1. Swipe down to fire your ant 360 degrees.
2. Hit as many Bugs as you can
3. Don't let the Bugs reach the nest
4. Collect more ants
5. Keep going and see how far you can go?
